about_the_game:
Soul exploration notes - Xiaonian · JIANGSHA makeup flower skirt (39999 spirit coins attached) DLC includes role Xiaonian · JIANGSHA makeup flower skirt, 39999 spirit coins attached with clothing



There are flowers on the other side. There is no relationship between flowers and leaves.

The body is covered with crimson yarn. The green silk flows down the jade neck like a waterfall. The golden silk on the skirt flashes light in the sun. The fragrance of flowers comes with mist. Gorgeous and elegant, charming and charming.
